name: Absconder (Festus, Demindiro, ShadowCurse, IyesGames)
description:
Absconder is a top-down shooter made during the Bevy Game Jam #1! It explores the "Unfair Advantage" theme - there's aliens, there's way more of them than there's you, and they have all the time in the world. And guess what - you don't!

Goal:
Angry aliens have overrun the colony. You have two minutes before the last evac shuttle launches. Find it, and board it in order to abscond this terrible situation.

Controls:

WSAD - movement

E - pick up items (medkits and ammo boxes)

R - reload your gun

Mouse 1 - fire

Good luck!

Project repo: https://github.com/PapugaPower/bevyjam
